item.title: RAG LLM Chatbot on CPU
item.description: This patterns deploys a CPU-based LLM, your choice of several RAG DB providers, and a simple chatbot UI which exposes the configuration and results of the RAG queries.

item.title: RAG-LLM pattern on Microsoft Azure
item.description: The RAG-LLM pattern on Microsoft Azure offers a robust and scalable solution for deploying LLM-based applications with integrated retrieval capabilities on Microsoft Azure.
